roleset.name: slow a car via brakes

example.name: not verbal
example.text: Mr. Redford , like it or not , is like a braking system on a runaway truck , kind of slowing it down into control .

example.name: ARG1
example.text: It has been suggested that tides have braked the spins of Mercury and Venus so much that they eventually have been captured in the present resonances ( see Section 4.9 , and Goldreich and Peale , 1966 ) .

propbank.arg: the spins of Mercury and Venus
so much that they eventually have been captured in the present resonances

roleset.note: BRAKE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'brake' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from brake.01-v predicate notes)
